channel.title: CGRU - AFANASY
channel.description: CGRU: CG Tools&Rules. Afanasy Free Open Source Render Farm Manager.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.6 Released.
item.description: PySide and license. New linux package 'afanasy-qtgui' to remove Qt dependence from 'afanasy-server' and 'afanasy-render' packages. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.5 Released.
item.description: Afanasy python parser can consider that task is already done and finish(stop) it with a success. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.4 Released.
item.description: New domain cgru.info started. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.3 Released.
item.description: Nuke render and submission scripts options added to skip paths map and render to temporary image stages. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.2 Released.
item.description: JSON age started. No binary python module needed. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.1 Released.
item.description: Tasks can be solved in a not-sequential manner. For example 1-10: 0 9 5 2 7 1 3 6 8 4. You can hide jobs or renders in AfWatch by some parameter. AfWatch can preview tasks of a not-numeric blocks (This bug is a main reason of this release).

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.0 Released.
item.description: Afanasy server is available for MS Windows platform. AfWatch GUI styles and various customizations. Default look is civil (not military). Administrator can change job owner. No Qt library in Afanasy render client. So Qt is used for GUI only now. GitHub CGRU project started.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.5 Released.
item.description: Server has customizable acceptable IP addresses mask. Movie Maker custom container and ability to save settings. User can set jobs solving to parallel. Only PostgreSQL database is supported as native library is used instead of QtSql.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.4 Released.
item.description: AltLinux RPM packages. Blender Cycles render engine support. Nimby schedule and Afanasy Starter improvements. MSVC 10 and Qt 4.8.0. Some important bugs fixed.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.2 Released.
item.description: Movie Maker can explode movie to sequence and add sound from a file with audio. Keeper displays local Afanasy render client status in a system tray icon. Some important bugs fixed.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.1 Released.
item.description: Keeper - a system tray application with menu, designed launch CGRU and AFANASY tools, setup and start other software applications to run with CGRU configured. Standalone dialog to submit jobs. Abobe After Effects support.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.0 Released.
item.description: Sub-task dependences to start render during simulation. Houdini submission major improvements. Technical changes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.4.5 Released.
item.description: MAX, Maya, XSI 2012. Blender 2.5. Python 3. Render client bug fix.
